name: Bottomless kraken stomach
description: A game made in 3 hours especially for TriJam! A game about a Viking that is trying to survive after the shipwreck that arranged him a kraken! He needs as much food as possible! His stomach is like a vacuum pump! It needs more and more! Hurry! We've got to feed him before it's too late! Everything I did here is recorded on my video, and I can easily show it to you if you'd like.
